original_text: A person really loves his friends if he dies so that they can live. Nobody could love anyone more than that.
korean_text: 사람이 친구를 위하여 자기 목숨을 버리면 이보다 더 큰 사랑이 없나니

sentences.original_text: A person really loves his friends
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람은 자기 친구들을 정말로 사랑한다

sentences.original_text: Nobody could love anyone more than that
